metadata.name: Delegated Permissions Granted For All Users
metadata.comment: Detects when highly privileged delegated permissions are granted on behalf of all users

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('add delegated permission grant'))

output.summary: Detects when highly privileged delegated permissions are granted on behalf of all users

metadata.objective: False positive: When the permission is legitimately needed for the app Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-applications#application-granted-highly-privileged-permissions
